title: 09/02/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/02/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss whether they'd rather hit a College tailgate or the actual game. Peter King joins the show to explain what he's considering when deciding his Super Bowl picks. And Pat Forde calls in the preview the college football season and chooses between Ohio State/Alabama or the Field to win the College Football title this season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
